scripts.build:pages: pnpm build && rm -rf _site && mkdir -p _site && cp _site_index.html _site/index.html && cp _headers _site/ && cp -r dashboard/dist _site/dashboard && cp -r family-chores/dist _site/family-chores && cp -r health-tracker/dist _site/health-tracker && cp -r kasa-controller/dist _site/kasa-controller && cp -r notes-app/dist _site/notes-app
